=== Scons ===

# ''Availability:'' The package is in ubuntu universe and available on all platforms.
# ''Rationale:'' This is a build dependency of kio-locate.  SCons is increasinly popular for building packages as a replacement for autotools.

# ''Quality assurance:''
** No configuration required after installation
** No critical bugs in Debian or Ubuntu.
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meeting debian-policy and debian's Python policy.  FHS also met.
